data.title: Awareness and Use of INFLIBNET’s N-LIST Consortium by the Faculty Members of selected Colleges affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University
data.meta_description: Awareness and Use of INFLIBNET’s N-LIST Consortium by the Faculty Members of selected Colleges affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University
data.text:
References

Arora, J. and Trivedi, K. (2011). National library and information services infrastructure for scholarly content: extending access to e-resources. University News,49(19), 1-8.

Atkinson, Jeremy (2019) Collaboration by academic libraries: What are the benefits, what are the constraints, and what do you need to do to be successful?, New Review of Academic Librarianship, 25(1), 1-7.

Ayoub, Arisha et al (2018): International Coalition of Library Consortia (ICOLC): Exploring the Diversity and Strength of Participating Library Consortia, Library Philosophy & Practice, available at https://digitalcommons.unl.edu/libphilprac/2115 retrieved on 25th March 2019.

Chakraborty, H.K. and Dangi Ram Kumar (2013).E-resources for college libraries in India via N-list. Professional Journal of Library and Information Technology, 3(2), 155-163.

Chikkamanju and Kiran Kumar (2014). Use of N-List services by Women’s First Grade Colleges Affiliated to University of Mysore: A study. Asian Journal of Multidisciplinary Studies, 2(7), 47-52.

Hanchinal Veeresh (2019). Awareness and Usage of E-resources of N-LIST Conortium: A study with reference to Academic colleges of Mumbai, Library Philosophy & Practice, available at https://digitalcommons.unl.edu/libphilprac/2340/ retrieved on 25th March 2020.

Khan Alamgir and Tripathi Tridib. (2015). Use of E-resources through Inflibnet N-list by the users of Chandidas Mahavidyalaya, West Bengal: A survey, Asian Journal of Multidiciplinary Studies, 3(6), 52-58.

Nesta, F. (2019), "Consortia from past to future", Library Management, 40( ½), pp. 12-22.

N-List ( 2018): N-List, available at http://nlist.inflibnet.ac.in retrieved on 20 January 2018.

Shinde Ramesh R. “N-list: Beneficial for College Libraries, in Emerging Technology in Library and Information Science by Mukhyadal B.G. and Khandare Rahul B., Atharva Publications, Dhule, ISBN-978-93-82795-04-9, pp.208-216.

Sinha, M. K., Bhattacharjee, S., and Bhattacharjee, S. (2013). ICT and internet literacy skills for accessing to E-resources available under N-LIST programme: A case study of college library users of Barak Valley, South Assam. Library Philosophy and Practice,

-27. Available at http://search.proquest.com/docview/1442362428?accountid=28682 Retrieved on 12 July 2019.
